marytts.modules
Class SynthesisCallerBase

java.lang.Object
  marytts.modules.InternalModule
      marytts.modules.SynthesisCallerBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
MaryModule
Direct Known Subclasses:
FestivalCaller, MbrolaCaller
public abstract class SynthesisCallerBase
extends InternalModule

A base class for a synthesis caller. This can work as a normal MARY module, converting synthesis markup data into audio, or it can be indirectly called from the corresponding Synthesizer.

Author:
Marc Schröder

startup

public void startup()
             throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: MaryModule
Allow the module to start up, performing whatever is necessary to become operational. After successful completion, getState() should return MODULE_RUNNING.

Specified by:
startup in interface MaryModule
Overrides:
startup in class InternalModule
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

powerOnSelfTest

public void powerOnSelfTest()
Perform a power-on self test by processing some example input data. This implementation does nothing; instead, the module test is carried out via Synthesis in the WaveformSynthesizer associated with this Caller.

Specified by:
powerOnSelfTest in interface MaryModule
Overrides:
powerOnSelfTest in class InternalModule
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the module does not work properly.

public MaryData process(MaryData d)
                 throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,

                        org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                        java.lang.Exception
From synthesis markup input d, create audio output of the type specified by a preceding call to setAudioType(). Returns a MaryData structure whose data is an input stream from which audio data of the specified type can be read.

Specified by:
process in interface MaryModule
Overrides:
process in class InternalModule
Returns:
A MaryData object of type outputType() encapsulating the processing result.

This method just returns its input. Subclasses should override this.

synthesiseOneSection

public abstract javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream synthesiseOneSection(java.lang.String synthesisMarkup,
                                                                          Voice voice)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
Synthesise one chunk of synthesis markup with a given voice.

Parameters:
synthesisMarkup - the input data in the native format expected by the synthesis engine
voice - the voice with which to synthesise the data
Returns:
an AudioInputStream in the native audio format of the voice
Throws:
java.io.IOException
